ModMetaData.name: Community Core Library
ModMetaData.author: RimWorld CCL Team
ModMetaData.description:
v0.14.3
Compatible with RimWorld builds: 1220, 1230, 1232, 1234, 1238, 1241, 1249
Provides a common core set of library functions for modders as well as making required core changes.
This must be loaded immediately after "Core".
